alert.note: Alert for Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 10:16AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Mitchell and southern Mower Counties through 1045 AM CDT... At 1015 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rose Creek, or 8 miles southeast of Austin, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Adams around 1030 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Meyer, Taopi, County Roads 56 And 5, Johnsburg, Varco, County Roads 4 And 8 and Elkton. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 180 and 191. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
